Reference

Query Data

nyt_get_data() nyt_set_query_params() nyt_set_time_chunks() nyt_query_api()

Query India-tagged articles from the New York Times Article Search API

Prepare Data

nyt_build_data()

Build data

nyt_bind_api_files() nyt_clean_api_tbl()

Bind monthly rds files into single nested df and perform initial cleaning

nyt_bind_news_desk_lookups() nyt_clean_news_desks()

Clean 'news_desk' values

nyt_unnest_df()

Unnest keyword values from nested df

nyt_bind_values_lookups() nyt_clean_keywords()

Clean keywords

nyt_fix_keywords()

Fix keywords

nyt_query_mapquest_api()

Query Mapquest API for lat-lon coordinates

nyt_join_coords_countries()

Join in coordinates and country status for location keywords

extract_rank() find_max_kword() nyt_re_nest_keywords()

Re-nest keywords

nyt_write_final_nested_df()

Write final nested dataset for shiny app

nyt_download_shiny_files()

Download shiny app files

Run the Shiny App

nyt_run_example()

Run NYT India app with sample data or lookup table app
